docs.snippet: Struggling British sportswear retailer Sports Direct is in talks to bid for Eastern Outfitters LLC, the parent of U.S. discount chain Bob's Stores and outdoor retailer Eastern Mountain Sports, people familiar with the matter said....

docs.snippet: Standard Life Investments, the fund arm of insurer Standard Life, has concerns about governance at Sports Direct and Volkswagen and will press for more change at the companies, it said in its annual governance report on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: Bayer Leverkusen's Hakan Calhanoglu will miss the remainder of the season after the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) on Thursday upheld a four-month ban imposed by FIFA over his contract dispute with Turkish club Trabzonspor....

docs.snippet: Luxury Italian sports carmaker Ferrari said Thursday that profits soared 38 percent in its first year as a stand-alone company, thanks to higher volumes of the 488 mid-engine family that is key to the company's growth plans....
docs.lead_paragraph: Luxury Italian sports carmaker Ferrari said Thursday that profits soared 38 percent in its first year as a stand-alone company, thanks to higher volumes of the 488 mid-engine family that is key to the company's growth plans.

headline.main: Ferrari 2016 Profits Soar as Sales Top 8,000 Vehicles
headline.print_headline: Ferrari 2016 Profits Soar as Sales Top 8,000 Vehicles

docs.snippet: Olympic Council of Asia President Sheikh Ahmad Al-Fahad Al-Sabah of Kuwait will seek re-election to the FIFA Council after the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) named him as one of eight candidates for the four spots available for the continent....
